/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngFrom */
SELECT em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1014',em.mtng_type_cd,#{lang}) as mtng_type_nm , em.dept_cd , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm3,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.excn_cycl , em.due_dtm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.reg_id , em.reg_dt FROM kgst.ebs_mtng em join kgst.com_dept cd on (em.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd) WHERE 1=1
AND em.dept_cd = #{deptCd}
AND (em.age_cd = #{searchAgeCd})
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(em.due_dtm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{searchFromDate}, ' 00:00:00'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TO_TIMESTAMP(em.due_dtm, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(concat(#{searchToDate}, ' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
order by em.reg_dt desc

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectMtngFrom */
SELECT em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1014',em.mtng_type_cd,#{lang}) as mtng_type_nm , em.dept_cd , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm1 , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1,cd.dept_nm2,cd.dept_nm3,#{lang}) as dept_nm , em.excn_cycl , em.due_dtm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.age_cd , em.rmk , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , em.reg_id , em.reg_dt FROM kgst.ebs_mtng em join kgst.com_dept cd on (em.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd) WHERE em.MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngAttendant */ select ema.atdt_user_id as member_id , ema.atdt_user_nm as member_nm , vum.dept_cd , case when ema.atdt_kind = 'ATT01' then '국회의원' else '장관' end dept_nm , vum.poly_cd , vum.poly_nm , ema.atdt_div_cd , vum.cmit_cd from kgst.ebs_mtng_attendant ema left join kgst.view_user_member vum on vum.user_id = ema.atdt_user_id where 1=1 and ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId} order by dept_nm, atdt_user_nm

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngAttendant */ SELECT vum.member_id --국회의원아이디 , CASE WHEN 'lng_type_1' = 'lng_type_1' then vum.member_nm_kg WHEN 'lng_type_1' = 'lng_type_2' then vum.member_nm_ru ELSE vum.member_nm_kg END AS memberNm , vum.dept_cd , vum.cmit_cd , CASE WHEN 'lng_type_1' = 'lng_type_1' then vum.dept_nm_kg WHEN 'lng_type_1' = 'lng_type_2' then vum.dept_nm_ru ELSE vum.dept_nm_kg END AS deptNm , vum.poly_cd , vum.poly_nm , ema.atdt_div_cd FROM kgst.view_user_member vum , kgst.ebs_mtng_attendant ema WHERE 1=1 AND vum.member_id = ema.atdt_user_id AND ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId} ORDER BY deptNm, memberNm

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngAgenda */ SELECT ema.mtng_id , em.bill_id -- 안건 ID , em.bill_no -- 안건 번호 , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then em.bill_name_kg WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then em.bill_name_ru ELSE em.bill_name_kg END AS billName , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cm.member_nm_kg WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then cm.member_nm_ru ELSE cm.member_nm_kg END AS ppsrNm , em.ppsr_id -- 발의자 아이디 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , ema.rslt_cd -- 처리결과 , ema.ord FROM kgst.EBS_MASTER em , kgst.EBS_MTNG_AGENDA ema , com_member cm WHERE 1=1 AND ema.bill_id = em.bill_id AND em.ppsr_id = cm.member_id AND ema.mtng_id = #{mtngId} order by ema.ord

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListDept */ select dept_cd --부서코드 , dept_nm1 --부서명(키르키즈어) , dept_nm2 --부서명(러시아어) , dept_nm3 --부서명(한국어) , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then dept_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then dept_nm2 ELSE dept_nm3 END AS deptNm , shrt_nm1 --부서 약칭(키르키즈어) , shrt_nm2 --부서 약칭(러시아어) , shrt_nm3 --부서 약칭(한국어) , ord --순서 , upr_dept_cd --상위부서코드 , use_yn --사용여부 , reg_dt --등록일자 , reg_id --등록자 , mod_id --수정자 , mod_dt --수정일자 from com_dept where 1=1 order by ord

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngFrom.repository.MtngFromMapper.selectListMtngFile */ SELECT SEQ , MTNG_ID , ORG_FILE_ID , ORG_FILE_NM , PDF_FILE_ID , PDF_FILE_NM , FILE_KIND_CD , FILE_SIZE , DELETE_YN FROM EBS_MTNG_FILE WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}
